mapper.update: UPDATE FROM RESERVATION SET RECACCEPT = '예약취소' WHERE RECNUM = #{recnum}
UPDATE FROM RECEPTION SET RECACCEPT = '접수취소' WHERE RECNUM = #{resnum}
mapper.select: SELECT RECNUM ,RECDATE, HOSPITAL.HOSNAME, SUBJECT.SUBNAME, RECNAME, RECACCEPT, RECCONTENTS FROM RECEPTION JOIN HOSPITAL ON RECEPTION.RECNUM = HOSPITAL.HOSNO JOIN SUBJECT ON RECEPTION.RECNUM = SUBJECT.SUBJECTCODE WHERE GENID = #{genid} ORDER BY RECDATE DESC
